summary:
This mod add a new male breton mage in Winterhold and a new set for mages.
EFF compatible
descriptionHtml:
MOD DESCRIPTION

This mod add a new male breton mage called Eavan in Winterhold and a new craftable set for mages.

Eavan can be found in the Frozen Hearth in Winterhold.

Inventory: a staff of lightning bolts, 30 septims, an elven dagger
and 3 potions of magicka.

Spells: Frostbite, Sparks, Lightning Bolts, Ice Spike, Oakflesh, Stoneflesh, Healing, Fast Healing,
Heal Other, Courage, Ward Greater, Ward Steadfast.

Perks: DestructionDualCasting, Augmented Frost, Augmented Shock, Deep Freeze, Novice, Apprentice and Adept Destruction,
Novice Restoration.


INSTALLATION
Copy the eavan.esp and bsa archive in your skyrim/Data folder.

UNINSTALL
Remove the eavan.esp and bsa archive in your skyrim/Data folder.

CREDITS
Natterforme - Imperial Mage Robes (Only clothing) - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35863/?
author: Shruikan
